Author: quietlyinteresting
Text: Don’t worry, take a step back. A deep breath and   Your body could be lacking any of the vitamins and minerals below. Your Mam could have worded her response a bit better. Keep an eye on it. It’s not falling out it just needs a little vitamin B or A or any of the supplements below. Destress and decompress.  1. Vitamin A. All cells need vitamin A for growth. ...  2. B-Vitamins. One of the best known vitamins for hair growth is a B-vitamin called biotin. ...  3. Vitamin C. ...  4. Vitamin D. ...  5. Vitamin E. ...  6. Iron. ...  7. Zinc. ...  8. Protein.
